amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, requires the Judicial Conference of the United States with the assistance of the Director of the Federal Judicial Center and the Director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts to prepare and transmit to the House and Senate Judiciary Committees a report on class action settlements in the Federal courts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to create a new section 7 which would require the Judical Conference of the United States to conduct a study and issue a report, including recommendations, within 12 months, detailing class action fee arrangements and ways they may be improved to benefit class members.

action.text: Hart amendment (A008) modified by unanimous consent. The modification changes page and line numbers.
